statements: SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_type FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT packaging_material, supplier_name, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE sustainability_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_type FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_material = 'Recycled' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_type FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_id > 5 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_material = 'Recycled' AND sustainability_rating > 4.5;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_material FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_type = 'Biodegradable' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, packaging_material, sustainability_rating FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE sustainability_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY supplier_name DESC, supplier_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, packaging_material FROM sustainable_packaging_practices;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_type, packaging_recyclable FROM sustainable_packaging_practices ORDER BY packaging_recyclable DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_type FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_material FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE packaging_type IN ('Cardboard', 'Plastic');
SELECT * FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_id, packaging_type, packaging_material FROM sustainable_packaging_practices WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Packaging%' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainable_packaging FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, packaging_material FROM Products WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers, Products, Orders WHERE Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id AND Products.product_id = Orders.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, sustainable_packaging FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainable_packaging = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, packaging_material FROM Products WHERE packaging_material IS NOT NULL ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT supplier_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM Products GROUP BY supplier_id HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 1;

SELECT supplier_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id JOIN Orders ON Products.product_id = Orders.product_id WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_material FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, analysis_date FROM suppliers JOIN analyses ON suppliers.supplier_id = analyses.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, total_price FROM sales ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, packaging_material, sustainable_practices FROM suppliers WHERE sustainable_practices = TRUE
SELECT p.product_name, s.supplier_name, sa.sale_date, sa.total_price FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN sales sa ON p.product_id = sa.product_id
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, sustainable_packaging FROM suppliers WHERE sustainable_packaging = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, product_name, material_name FROM suppliers JOIN supplier_products ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplier_products.supplier_id JOIN products ON supplier_products.product_id = products.product_id JOIN product_materials ON products.product_id = product_materials.product_id JOIN packaging_materials ON product_materials.material_id = packaging_materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers WHERE sustainable_packaging = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, m.material_name, pm.quantity FROM products p JOIN product_materials pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id JOIN packaging_materials m ON pm.material_id = m.material_id;
SELECT s.supplier_name, COUNT(sp.product_id) AS total_products FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN supplier_products sp ON s.supplier_id = sp.supplier_id GROUP BY s.supplier_name;
